item_collector module¶

item_collector.get_and_append(arr, filename)[source]¶

A function which loads a stored collection and extends it

Parameters:
  • arr (list) – The list with gram matrices to be added
  • filename (str) – The name of the file with the collection to be extended
item_collector.get_filenames_collection(cat)[source]¶

Returns the the filenames collection from the file system

Parameters:cat (int) – The id of the category for which we want to retrive the collection
Returns:An array with the filenames collection
Return type:ndarray
item_collector.get_files_filename(cat)[source]¶

Returns the name of the collection file for the file names

Parameters:cat (int) – The id of the category for which we want to retrive the collection
Returns:the path to the collection
Return type:str
item_collector.get_files_from_path(image_path)[source]¶

A function which only keeps the files in a folder

Parameters:image_path (Path) – The path to the folder with images
Returns:The paths of the files in the specified folder
Return type:list
item_collector.get_grams_collection(cat)[source]¶

Returns the the grams collection from the file system

Parameters:cat (int) – The id of the category for which we want to retrive the collection
Returns:An array with the gram matrices collection
Return type:ndarray
item_collector.get_grams_filename(cat)[source]¶

Returns the name of the collection file for the gram matrices

Parameters:cat (int) – The id of the category for which we want to retrive the collection
Returns:the path to the collection
